exitcodes.exit1: Not Supported - WmI result code - Setting is not supported on system.
exitcodes.exit2: Unknows - WmI result code - Operation failed for unknown reason.
exitcodes.exit3: Timeout - WmI result code - Operation timed out.
exitcodes.exit4: Failed - WmI result code - Operation failed.
exitcodes.exit5: Invalid Parameter - WmI result code - A parameter is missing or wrong type.
exitcodes.exit6: Access Denied - WmI result code - Setting modification failed due to BIOS permissions.
exitcodes.exit11: Config file not valid - BcU was unable to locate the configuration file or unable to read the file at the specified path.
exitcodes.exit12: First line in the configuration file must be the word “BIOSconfig” followed by the file format version, currently “1.0”.
exitcodes.exit13: BcU failed to change one or more settings. Use /verbose or /WarningAserr to get status per setting.
exitcodes.exit14: BcU not ready to write file.
exitcodes.exit16: Unable to write to file or system. BcU was unable to connect to HP BIOS WmI. WmI classes are corruptedor the system is not supported.
exitcodes.exit22: Unable to connect to HP BIOS WmI namespace.
exitcodes.exit23: Unable to connect to HP WmI namespace
exitcodes.exit24: Unable to connect to PUBLIc WmI namespace
exitcodes.exit33: No settings to apply found in config file.
exitcodes.exit41: Invalid UID. Invalid Universal Unique Identifier.
